### The Pipe

I would read each pipe as "then." For example:

```{r eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
data %>% 
  filter(age < 25) %>% 
  group_by(ed) %>% 
  summarize(mean_gestation = mean(gestation, na.rm = TRUE))

```
